Summary: Milky object traveling from north to south
divs: Sighting Detailsrelaxing in the hot tub on back deck south side of house looking up counting aircraft when this object streaked from zenith to the southern horizion almost due North to South aproximately 1 to 1 half seconds to disappearance at aprox 45 degrees no sound milky white glow maybe a short trail but that might have been due to eye presistance thought first meteor but never saw a meteor travel due south and white mist in color approx time was 2015 EST todays date 1232004 unable to enter 2004 in the first box I have approximately 7 High altitude air routes that cross over near my location Evansville, Indiana 8 miles west of Red Bank road on highway 62 and then 1 half miles north
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Mt Vernon
There were no other sightings in Mt Vernon on or around January 23rd 2004
